summary: Three Spanish guys create a code to win money at the casinos.
cast: Daniel Brühl|Lluís Homar|Miguel Ángel Silvestre|Oriol Vila|Vicente Romero|Huichi Chiu|Blanca Suárez|Marina Salas|Eduard Fernández|Qi Li|Paco Hidalgo|Martí Peraferrer|Xavier Boada|Susanna Garachana|Mark Ullod|Eduardo González|Marta Vila|Ferran Lahoz|Carlos Galiana|Tamara Cunill|Xelo Curiel|Zhi Chao Yin|Junyi Sun|Yiyiang Lin|Rachel Lascar|Jean Michel Choquet|Paco Moreno|Arantxa González|Assun Planas|Cristina Peralta|Jesús Perona|Montse Kao|Wenjun Gao|Roberto Chan|Hotien Chang|Marco Hernández|Susana Jang Yi|Julia de Castro|Miguel Rodrigáñez|Alba Laguna|Ramon Rabinad|Micka Luna|Carla Móra|Irene Ruiz|Marta Móra|Mark Oliver Everett|Kike Martínez|Sònia Casademont
title: Los Pelayos
